CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 7, 1941, pg. 12, reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Wilson Sherrow Purchase New Ford from Pettey - The saying that there are no limits to the field of a hustling salesman was exemplified last week by Walter Pettey, representative of Steel City Motors, 3131 Forbes street, Ma. 8844.  During the week of May 26, Pettey delivered new cars to Lee Fuqua, Pittsburgh; Ralph Weems, Tarentum; Mrs. Bessie Merrell, Boston, Mass.; and Wilson L. Sherrow, of Canonsburg, Pa.  In the picture above, Mr. Pettey is making delivery of a new 1941 Super Deluxe Ford to Mr. and Mrs. Wilson L. Sherrow of Canonsburg, Pa."
TitMainTitle: Steel City Motors car salesman Walter Pettey posed with Wilson L. Sherrow, Mrs. Sherrow, and another woman seated in 1941 Super Deluxe Ford car, parked in dirt street, Canonsburg, Pennsylvania
